sentence.Network_en: Trapped inside was an extinct breed of stingless bee.
sentence.Network_cn: 陷入其中的是一只已经灭绝的无蛰针蜜蜂.

list.abs: 因为它们无刺的叶子而长的很矮的热带多年生的植物。 3. The Biological Characteristics and Utilities of Stingless Bee 无刺蜂的生物学特性及应用 4. A male.
2.2无刺蜂属 stingless bee蜜蜂科，麦蜂族中雌蜂无螫刺的一个属。.
small genus of stingless herbs ., 无毛刺的草本的小属.
bee：蜜蜂tropical stingless bee：麦蜂potter wasp：蜾蠃
（注二）工蜂（Bees of England）：比喻勤劳的英格兰人。诗中还用“无刺的雄蜂”（stingless drones）暗示不劳而获的统治者，亦指后面所言的“懒鬼”（the idle）。

auth_sentence.content: Other less well known types include stingless and carpenter bees.

auth_sentence.content: Stingless bees, scientists have found, keep a "spare" virgin queen locked away.

auth_sentence.content: "Dr Paulo Nogueira-Neto, is one of the world's leading experts on stingless bees," Prof Ratnieks told BBC Nature.
